mysql.name: del_t_member
mysql.sql: DELETE t.* from t_member t where t.PHONE = '%(phone)s';

mysql.name: del_t_member_address
mysql.sql: DELETE a.* from t_member_address a where EXISTS(SELECT 1 from t_member t where t.PHONE = '%(phone)s' and t.id = a.MEMBER_ID);
mysql.desc: 删除昨天用户的签到数据

mysql.name: del_t_points
mysql.sql: DELETE s.* from t_points s where EXISTS(SELECT 1 from t_member t where t.PHONE = '%(phone)s' and t.id = s.MEMBER_ID);
mysql.desc: 插入昨天用户的签到数据

mysql.name: del_t_point_logs

mysql.name: del_t_order_detail
mysql.sql: DELETE d.* from t_order_detail d where EXISTS(select r.* from t_order r,t_member t where r.member_id= t.ID and t.PHONE = '%(phone)s' and d.ORDER_ID = r.id) ;
mysql.desc: 插入昨天用户的签到数据

mysql.desc: 插入昨天用户的签到数据

mysql.name: select_memberid_t_member
mysql.sql: select id from t_member t where t.PHONE = '%(phone)s';
